main event: Two OSI special agents observed a round, white object that turned red, moving at high speed and making sharp maneuvers in the sky over Osan, Korea on August 29, 1961.
interesting points: The object appeared and disappeared quickly, lasting only 1-2 seconds.
The object changed color from white to red as it moved.
The object made sudden, sharp movements, including stopping and changing direction by 90 degrees.
The object moved at speeds greater than any known aircraft.
There was no sound associated with the object.
sighted object: round, white object that turned red
